document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Ah, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#18ff86">Teneriffe </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48ff56">Receding </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48ff56">Mountain </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#18ff86">Purples </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7cf0ff">Ages </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#18ff86">halt </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">for </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">You </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48ff56">Sunset </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#18ff86">reviews </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Her </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#18ff86">Sapphire </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d440ff">Regiments </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48ff56">Day </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#18ff86">drops </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">You </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">His </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#18ff86">Red </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#18ff86">Adieu </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Still </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#18ff86">clad </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Your </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#18ff86">Mail </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48ff56">Ices </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48ff56">Eye </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#18ff86">Granite </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">and </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c06cff">Ear </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#18ff86">Steel </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#18ff86">Passive </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48ff56">alike </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48ff56">Pomp </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">and </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48ff56">Parting </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Ah, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#18ff86">Teneriffe </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">We're </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48ff56">pleading </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">still </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Ah, Teneriffe - receding mountain
